p.s: Ankita Mitra exposes, that our fast change in the industry and growth of urbans do not increase our lifestyle - but put our health such as the future living on the earth down.

The environmental pollution is according to Ankita a menancemenace , which rapidly destroys the healthy living conditions, for example the sea life, the plants - even more animals - and moreover human beings.
In fabrics it comes to accidents, where big areas are destroyed.
New technologies often put our environment in danger.
Our daily habit, to use transports and other inventions, which make our livelife easier, but tend more to reduce the life of the nature.
The industry is capable of producing or filtering poisonous materials, which after a certain use, land in lakes or earth.
